physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neurologic examination was unremarkable. Mental status examination was unremarkable other than mild blocking that was not associated with psychotic symptoms.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: During a follow-up visit, the patient stated that since resuming diphenylhydantoin, the number of attacks had decreased strikingly from three or more severe attacks a day to three severe episodes in the past 3 months.
